result.execSummary:
The defendant Robert Lenord Hoff was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Repeated 1st Deg. Sex.Assault-Same Child, a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.025(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: $90 DOC Collect due within 180 days after Release from Prison.  If Extended Supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect.
No contact directly or indirectly with any minor under 18
Must Register as Sex Offender and complete Sex Offender Treatment and Counseling; Must Submit to DNA Sample

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert Lenord Hoff

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Victim notification information YES card filed and sealed.

Defendant Robert Lenord Hoff in court with attorney Richard R. McCue.  Perry L Folts appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court orders: 10 years bifurcated sentence: 2 years WSPrison, 8 years Extended Supervision w/conditions: No contact with any minors under 18, Must Register as Sex Offender, Must Submit to DNA Sample, Sex Offender Treatment and Counseling; Costs-DOC Collect due within 180 days after release from Prison, 0 days credit; Deft IS NOT ELIGIBLE for Challenge Incarceration Program or Substance Abuse Program.

Defendant Robert Lenord Hoff in court with attorney Richard R. McCue.  Anne Theresa Nack appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deft pleads Guilty freely and voluntarily; Cuort accepts plea and finds Deft Guilty; PSI ORDERED, due 04-30-15, Bond continued;  Sentencing hearing scheduled for May 7, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Defendant Robert Lenord Hoff in court with attorney Richard R. McCue.  Scott H. Dirks appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Status conference scheduled for March 3, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant Robert Lenord Hoff in court with attorney Richard R. McCue.  Scott H. Dirks appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Status conference scheduled for January 13, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Calendar call on December 4, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Administrative assignment transfer, approved by Presiding Judge James P. Daley.
Defendant Robert Lenord Hoff in court with attorney Richard R. McCue.  Mason C. Braunschweig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Status conference scheduled for December 5, 2014 at 09:00 am.
Defendant Robert Lenord Hoff in court with attorney Richard R. McCue.  Jodi Dabson Bollendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Status conference scheduled for August 26, 2014 at 02:00 pm.
Status conference on July 15, 2014 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Robert Lenord Hoff in court with attorney Richard R McCue.  Perry L Folts appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deft waives Preliminary Hearing Freely & Voluntarily; Rights Given; Court binds Deft over for the filing of an Information; Information filed; Copy to Deft; Reading waived; Deft stands mute; Not Guilty Plea entered by court; Jury Trial to be set

Defendant Robert Lenord Hoff in court with attorney Richard R McCue.  Gwanny J Tjoa appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed; Copy to Deft; Penalties advised; Rights given; Reading waived. Continued Preliminary Hearing 05-19-2014 at 8:30am "L"
No contact directly or indirectly with victim, L.H. dob 02-02-93, his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere, and No Contact wtih any other Minor Child
